title: Glen Echo Park: Passport Stamp
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Passport Stamp              Passport Stamp Locations          Glen Echo Park has three imprint stamps for Eastern National's Passport to Your National Parks book: an imprint stamp for Glen Echo Park, one for the Clara Barton Parkway and one for Clara Barton National Historic Site. These are located in the first floor lobby of the Arcade Building on the NPS desk. The adjacent Clara Barton National Historic Site is only open for tours on Saturdays at 11, Noon, 2, and 3 and Sundays at 1, 2, 3, and 4. For more information about visiting the Clara Barton National Historic Site visit www.nps.gov/clba or call 301-320-1410. For more information about Eastern National's Passport to Your National Park program, visit the Eastern National website.
